masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"The cold snap froze the main water distribution hub! Half the city has no water on Christmas Eve. Hospitals are on emergency reserves, fire hydrants won't work, and 50,000 households can't cook their Christmas dinners. We need the hub thawed without bursting the pipes!"

Requirements

  • Thaw the water hub carefully—too fast and pipes burst
  • Deliver water to critical facilities while repairs happen
  • This is a city-wide crisis—coordinate with emergency services
